# rotation

**Instance Property**

The rotation of the gesture in radians.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var rotation: CGFloat { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property contains the current rotation in effect for the gesture. Changing the value in this property also updates the value in the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSRotationGestureRecognizer/rotationInDegrees] property.

## Interpreting the Gesture

- **rotationInDegrees**: The rotation of the gesture in degrees.
